cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl
类 PreloadDataCache<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.SimpleCache<K,V>
      cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.PreloadDataCache<K,V>
所有已实现的接口：
Cache<K,V>, java.io.Serializable
直接已知子类：
ImageMemoryCache, ImageSDCardCache
public class PreloadDataCache<K,V>
extends SimpleCache<K,V>

Preload data cache, It a good choice for network application which need to preload data.

you can use this cache to preload data, it support preload data backward, forward or both. and you can set preload count.

    Setting and Usage
  • Use one of constructors below to init cache
  • setOnGetDataListener(OnGetDataListener) set how to get data, this cache will get data and preload data by it
  • SimpleCache.setCacheFullRemoveType(CacheFullRemoveType) set remove type when cache is full
  • get(Object, List) get object, if list is not null, will preload data auto according to keys in list
  • get(Object) get object, and not preload data
  • setForwardCacheNumber(int) set count for preload forward, default is DEFAULT_FORWARD_CACHE_NUMBER
  • setBackwardCacheNumber(int) set count for preload backward, default is DEFAULT_BACKWARD_CACHE_NUMBER
  • setContext(Context) and setAllowedNetworkTypes(int) restrict the types of networks over which this data can get.
  • SimpleCache.setValidTime(long) set valid time of elements in cache, in mills
  • SimpleCache.saveCache(String, SimpleCache) save cache to a file
    Constructor
  • PreloadDataCache()
  • PreloadDataCache(int)
  • PreloadDataCache(int, int)
  • loadCache(String) restore cache from file

另请参见：

构造方法详细信息

PreloadDataCache

public PreloadDataCache()
  • Maximum size of the cache is SimpleCache.DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE
  • Elements of the cache will not invalid, can set by SimpleCache.setValidTime(long)
  • Remove type is RemoveTypeEnterTimeFirst when cache is full
  • Size of getting data thread pool is DEFAULT_THREAD_POOL_SIZE

PreloadDataCache

public PreloadDataCache(int maxSize)
  • Elements of the cache will not invalid, can set by SimpleCache.setValidTime(long)
  • Remove type is RemoveTypeEnterTimeFirst when cache is full
  • Size of getting data thread pool is DEFAULT_THREAD_POOL_SIZE

参数：
maxSize - maximum size of the cache

PreloadDataCache

public PreloadDataCache(int maxSize,
                        int threadPoolSize)
  • Elements of the cache will not invalid, can set by SimpleCache.setValidTime(long)
  • Remove type is RemoveTypeEnterTimeFirst when cache is full

参数：
maxSize - maximum size of the cache
threadPoolSize - getting data thread pool size
方法详细信息

get

public CacheObject<V> get(K key,
                          java.util.List<K> keyList)
get data synchronous and preload new data asynchronous according to keyList

参数：
key -
keyList - key list, if is null, not preload, else preload forward by preloadDataForward(Object, List, int), preload backward by preloadDataBackward(Object, List, int)
返回：
element if this cache contains the specified key, else get data realtime and wait for it
另请参见：
get(Object)

get

public CacheObject<V> get(K key)
get data synchronous
  • if key is null, return null, else
  • if key is already in cache, return the element that mapping with the specified key, else
  • call PreloadDataCache.OnGetDataListener.onGetData(Object) to get data and wait for it finish

指定者：
接口 Cache<K,V> 中的 get
覆盖：
类 SimpleCache<K,V> 中的 get
参数：
key -
返回：
element if this cache contains the specified key, else get data realtime and wait for it

preloadDataForward

protected int preloadDataForward(K key,
                                 java.util.List<K> keyList,
                                 int cacheCount)
preload data forward
    Preload rule below:
    If key is null or list is empty, not preload, else circle keyList front to back.
    If entry in the list equals to key, begin preload until to the end of list or preload count has reached cacheCount, like this:
  • if entry is already in cache or is getting data, continue next entry. else
  • new thread to get data and continue next entry

参数：
key -
keyList - if is null, not preload
cacheCount - count for preload forward
返回：
count for getting data, that is cacheCount minus count of keys whose alreadey in cache

preloadDataBackward

protected int preloadDataBackward(K key,
                                  java.util.List<K> keyList,
                                  int cacheCount)
preload data backward
    Preload rule below:
    If key is null or list is empty, not preload, else circle keyList back to front.
    If entry in the list equals to key, begin preload until to the front of list or preload count has reached cacheCount, like this:
  • if entry is already in cache or is getting data, continue last entry. else
  • new thread to get data and continue last entry

参数：
key -
keyList - if is null, not preload
cacheCount - count for preload forward
返回：
count for getting data, that is cacheCount minus count of keys whose alreadey in cache

getAllowedNetworkTypes

public int getAllowedNetworkTypes()
get the types of networks over which this data can get

返回：
any combination of the NETWORK_* bit flags.

setAllowedNetworkTypes

public void setAllowedNetworkTypes(int allowedNetworkTypes)
Restrict the types of networks over which this data can get. By default, all network types are allowed.
    Attentions:
  • To make it effective, you need to ensure that getContext() is not null

参数：
allowedNetworkTypes - any combination of the NETWORK_* bit flags.

isCheckNetwork

public boolean isCheckNetwork()
get whether to check the network at first when get data, used when checkIsNetworkTypeAllowed()

返回：

set whether to check the network at first when get data, used when checkIsNetworkTypeAllowed()

isCheckNetwork -

public Context getContext()

setContext

public void setContext(Context context)
used when checkIsNetworkTypeAllowed()

参数：
context -

checkIsNetworkTypeAllowed

public boolean checkIsNetworkTypeAllowed()
Check if get data can proceed over the given network type.

参数：
networkType - a constant from ConnectivityManager.TYPE_*.
返回：
one of the NETWORK_* constants
  • if getContext() is null, return true
  • if network is not avaliable, return false
  • if getAllowedNetworkTypes() is not match network, return false
